question: Which Indian Tennis player recently won the ‘WTA Hobart International doubles title’ along with partner Nadiia Kichenok?
explanation:
After a two-year formal maternity break, India’s ace tennis player Sania Mirza clinched the ‘WTA Hobart International doubles title along with her Ukrainian partner Nadiia Kichenok. In the final match which lasted for 1 hour 21 minutes, Sania along with her partner defeated the second seeded Chinese duo Shaui Peng and Shuai Zhang 6-4, 6-4. 
This was the first tournament for the 33-year old Sania, after giving birth to her son. This series proved to be a great come-back for the Indian star, while she earned her 42nd WTA doubles title.
